attributes.action: criminalise child sexual abuse organised by abusing covert operations powers  as available to various bodies, by giving police special powers to investigate in these circumstances.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The police are not currently permitted to investigate activities of covert authority holders. The remit of The Investigatory Powers tribunal, who do oversee these activities, excludes investigating sexual abuse. Therefor sexual abuse, organised under covert authority is above investigation.
